title: David and Bathsheba
summary: David commits adultery with Bathsheba, the wife of Uriah, one of his soldiers. After she becomes pregnant, David tries to cover it up and eventually has Uriah killed in battle. He then takes Bathsheba as his wife, but God is displeased.

faq.question: What sin did David commit?
faq.answer: Adultery with Bathsheba and the arranged killing of her husband Uriah.

faq.question: How did David try to cover his sin?
faq.answer: He brought Uriah home hoping he would sleep with Bathsheba, and when that failed, sent him to die in battle.
